title: Silicon nanostructure cloak operating at optical frequencies
title_cn: 以光频率工作的硅纳米结构披风
abstract: The ability to render objects invisible using a cloak (such that they are not detectable by an external observer) has long been a tantalizing goal. Here, we demonstrate a cloak operating in the near infrared at a wavelength of 1,550 nm. The cloak conceals a deformation on a flat reflecting surface, under which an object can be hidden. The device has an area of 225 µm2 and hides a region of 1.6 µm2. It is composed of nanometre-size silicon structures with spatially varying densities across the cloak. The density variation is defined using transformation optics to define the effective index distribution of the cloak.
abstract_cn: 使用斗篷使对象不可见的能力（使外部观察者无法检测到它们）一直是诱人的目标。 在这里，我们展示了一种斗篷，该斗篷在波长为1,550纳米的近红外波段工作。 斗篷在平坦的反射表面上隐藏了变形，可以隐藏物体。 该设备的面积为225＆＃160;＆＃181; m 2 ，并且隐藏了1.6＆＃160;＆＃181; m 2 的区域。 它由纳米尺寸的硅结构组成，在整个披风中具有不同的密度。 通过转换光学器件定义披风的有效折射率分布来定义密度变化。

title: Tunable bipolar optical interactions between guided lightwaves
title_cn: 导光波之间可调谐的双极光学相互作用
abstract: State-of-the-art advances in nanoscale optomechanics allow light to be guided in free-standing waveguides or resonators. In closely spaced devices, the coupling between the guided lightwaves gives rise to an optical force known as the ‘optical bonding force’. Indeed, attractive optical force has been observed in substrate coupled devices. According to recent theoretical predictions, the optical force should show bipolar behaviour depending on the relative phase between in-plane coupled lightwaves. So far, such an in-plane optical force has not been measured. Here, we experimentally demonstrate a bipolar optical force between planarly coupled nanophotonic waveguides. Both attractive and repulsive optical forces are obtained. The sign of the force can be switched reversibly by tuning the relative phase of the interacting lightwaves. This highly engineerable force of bipolar nature could be used as the operation principle for a new class of planar light force devices and circuits on a CMOS-compatible platform.
abstract_cn: 纳米级光机技术的最新发展使光可以在独立的波导或谐振器中被引导。在间隔很小的设备中，被引导的光波之间的耦合会产生称为“光学结合力”的光学力。实际上，在基板耦合装置中已经观察到引力。根据最新的理论预测，光力应表现出双极性行为，具体取决于面内耦合光波之间的相对相位。到目前为止，还没有测量这种面内光学力。在这里，我们实验证明了平面耦合纳米光子波导之间的双极光学力。既获得了吸引力，又获得了排斥力。力的符号可以通过调整相互作用的光波的相对相位来可逆地切换。这种高度可工程化的双极性性质可以用作CMOS兼容平台上新型平面光力器件和电路的工作原理。

title: Phase shaping of single-photon wave packets
title_cn: 单光子波包的相位整形
abstract: Although the phase of a coherent light field can be precisely known, this is not true for the phase of the individual photons that create the field, considered individually. Phase changes within single-photon wave packets, however, have observable effects. In fact, actively controlling the phase of individual photons has been identified as a powerful resource for quantum communication protocols. Here we demonstrate arbitrary phase control of a single photon. The phase modulation is applied without affecting the photon's amplitude profile and is verified by means of a two-photon quantum interference measurement, demonstrating fermionic spatial behaviour of photon pairs. Combined with previously demonstrated control of a single photon's amplitude, frequency, and polarization, the fully deterministic phase shaping presented here allows for the complete control of single-photon wave packets.
abstract_cn: 尽管可以精确地知道相干光场的相位，但是对于单独考虑的创建场的单个光子的相位却不是这样。 但是，单光子波包内的相位变化会产生明显的影响。 实际上，主动控制单个光子的相位已被认为是量子通信协议的强大资源。 在这里，我们演示了单个光子的任意相位控制。 在不影响光子幅度分布的情况下施加相位调制，并通过双光子量子干涉测量进行了验证，证明了光子对的费米离子空间行为。 结合先前展示的对单个光子的幅度，频率和偏振的控制，此处介绍的完全确定性的相位整形可以完全控制单光子波包。

title: Pressure-assisted tip-enhanced Raman imaging at a resolution of a few nanometres
title_cn: 压力辅助的尖端增强拉曼成像，分辨率为几纳米
abstract: Scanning probe microscopy methods can image samples with extremely high resolutions, opening up a wide range of applications in physics, chemistry and biology. However, these passive techniques, which trace the sample surface softly, give indirect topographic information. Here, we show an active imaging technique that has the potential to achieve optically a molecular resolution by directly interacting and perturbing the sample molecules. This technique makes use of an external pressure, applied selectively on a nanometric volume of the sample through the apex of a sharp nanotip, to obtain a local distortion of only those molecules that are pressurized. The vibrational frequencies of these molecules are distinctly different from those of unpressurized molecules. By sensing this difference, our active microscopic technique can achieve extremely high resolution. Using an isolated single-walled carbon nanotube and a two-dimensional adenine nanocrystal, we demonstrate a spatial resolution of 4 nm.
abstract_cn: 扫描探针显微镜方法可以以极高的分辨率对样品成像，从而在物理，化学和生物学领域开辟了广泛的应用。但是，这些被动技术可以轻柔地跟踪样品表面，从而提供间接的地形信息。在这里，我们展示了一种主动成像技术，它有可能通过直接相互作用和干扰样品分子来光学地实现分子分辨率。该技术利用通过尖锐的纳米尖端的顶点选择性地施加在样品的纳米体积上的外部压力，来获得仅那些受压分子的局部变形。这些分子的振动频率与未加压分子的振动频率明显不同。通过检测到这种差异，我们的有源显微技术可以实现极高的分辨率。使用隔离的单壁碳纳米管和二维腺嘌呤纳米晶体，我们证明了4＆＃160; nm的空间分辨率。

title: Static and dynamic wavelength routing via the gradient optical force
title_cn: 通过梯度光学力进行静态和动态波长路由
abstract: We propose and demonstrate an all-optical wavelength routing approach that uses a tuning mechanism based upon the optical gradient force in a specially designed nano-optomechanical system. The resulting mechanically compliant ‘spiderweb’ resonator realizes seamless wavelength routing over a range of 3,000 times the intrinsic channel width, with a tuning efficiency of 309 GHz mW−1, a switching time of less than 200 ns, and 100% channel quality preservation over the entire tuning range. These results indicate the potential for radiation pressure actuated devices to be used in a variety of photonics applications, such as channel routing/switching, buffering, dispersion compensation, pulse trapping/release and widely tunable lasers.
abstract_cn: 我们提出并演示了一种全光学波长路由方法，该方法在特殊设计的纳米光学机械系统中使用基于光梯度力的调谐机制。 产生的机械柔韧性蜘蛛网。 谐振器可在固有信道宽度的3,000倍的范围内实现无缝波长路由，调谐效率为309＆＃160; GHz＆＃160; mW ＆＃8722; 1 ，切换时间少于200＆ ＃160; ns，并在整个调谐范围内保持100％的通道质量。 这些结果表明，辐射压力致动设备有可能用于各种光子学应用，例如通道路由/切换，缓冲，色散补偿，脉冲捕获/释放和广泛可调的激光器。
